Lyric:
[00:01.29]编曲：接个吻，开一枪
[00:09.80]I won't lie to you

[00:13.96]I know he's just not right for you

[00:19.20]And you can tell me if I'm off

[00:20.49]But I see it on your face

[00:21.77]When you say that he's the one that you want

[00:24.18]And you're spending all your time

[00:25.42]In this wrong situation

[00:26.60]And anytime you want it to stop

[00:28.84]I know I can treat you better

[00:32.09]Than he can

[00:33.48]And any girl like you deserves a gentleman

[00:38.04]Tell me why are we wasting time

[00:39.95]on all your wasted crime

[00:41.12]When you should be with me instead

[00:43.41]I know I can treat you better

[00:47.72]Better than he can

[01:07.64]Better than he can

[01:08.94]I'll stop time for you

[01:12.79]The second you say you'd like me too

[01:18.07]I just wanna give you the loving that you're missing

[01:20.54]Baby, just to wake up with you

[01:23.14]Would be everything I need and this could be so different

[01:25.40]Tell me what you want to do

[01:27.52]Cause I know I can treat you better

[01:30.70]Than he can

[01:32.27]And any girl like you deserves a gentleman

[01:37.11]Tell me why are we wasting time

[01:38.73]And all on your wasted crime

[01:39.89]When you should be with me instead

[01:42.20]I know I can treat you better

[01:46.50]Better than he can

[02:07.31]Give me a sign

[02:09.43]Take my hand, we'll be fine

[02:12.07]Promise I won't let you down

[02:17.04]Just know that you don't

[02:18.99]Have to do this alone

[02:21.92]Promise I'll never let you down

[02:26.23]Cause I know I can treat you better
